title: SSD MobileNet V1
description: Efficient object detection on edge devices
long_description: The MobileNet-SSD model is a Single-Shot Multibox Detection (SSD) network designed for object detection tasks. It uses MobileNet as its backbone architecture, which is a flexible and efficient design suitable for various use cases. Depending on the specific application, the model can utilize different input sizes and width multipliers, allowing for adjustments in model size and computational cost. This flexibility helps to significantly lower the number of multiply-add operations, making the model well-suited for inference on mobile and edge devices. MobileNet-SSD is a Single-Shot Multibox Detection network engineered for efficient object detection on edge devices. This versatile model combines the lightweight MobileNet backbone architecture with SSD detection methodology to deliver optimized performance in resource-constrained environments. Additionally, the model is quantized to int8 using the TensorFlow Lite converter to further optimize it for performance on resource-constrained environments. MobileNet-SSD provides exceptional versatility through its configurable design parameters, allowing developers to fine-tune the model's size and computational requirements according to specific deployment scenarios while maintaining effective object detection capabilities on edge computing platforms.
